alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Franklin; Furnas; Gosper; Harlan; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 29 at 8:11PM CDT until April 30 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR SOUTHERN AND SOUTHWEST PORTIONS OF OUR AREA ON SUNDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 8 PM CDT SUNDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTH CENTRAL KANSAS ALONG WITH NEBRASKA COUNTIES ALONG AND WEST OF A LEXINGTON TO FRANKLIN LINE... * WINDS...From the north-northwest, sustained 20 to 25 MPH and gusting up to around 35 MPH. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 to 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly. Use caution if engaging in activities that may result in a fire starting.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Dawson; Franklin; Furnas; Gosper; Harlan; Phelps
